column1: '''''Tolkien and Romanticism''''' is a collection of the proceedings of [[The Tolkien Society]]'s Cambridge Tolkien Workshop 1988.
* Tolkien and the Development of Romance
* Tolkien, Wagner, and the End of the Romantic Age
* Bow-Wow or Pooh-Pooh: Natural Models of Language from Plato to Tolkien
* Elf-Spear, The Wand of Youth, and the Starlight Express
